summary: An author tells the story of how, as a young boy growing up in a 1960s small town, he was haunted after witnessing the murder of a little girl.
cast: Lukas Haas|Len Cariou|Alex Rocco|Katherine Helmond|Jason Presson|Renata Vanni|Angelo Bertolini|Joelle Jacobi|Jared Rushton|Gregory Levinson|Lucy Lee Flippin|Tom Bower|Jack Andreozzi|Sydney Lassick|Rita Zohar|Hal Bokar|Rose Weaver|Henry Harris|Bruce Kirby|Emily Tracy|Karen Powell|Lisa Taylor|Daniel Rojo|Gregory L. Everage|Ellen Marguerite Cullivan|Frank LaLoggia|Rick Leisenring|Mitch Sandusky
title: El misterio de la dama blanca
